title: describe your main's sound effects with words
body:
saw this post on reddit and made me lol

{{champion:22}} 
Q: FwIW FwIW FwIW
W: fwew
E: shshhSHHshhSsshsHShhhshsh PSSHHHHHshshshsh (sparkling noises)
R:pCHew (upon hitting) Chonk

{{champion:236}} 
Q: dweeetich

W: "hunnn" dchew

E: Hinnn!

R: Ashes and dust! dwooshdwooshdwooshdwooshdwooshdwoosh

replies.body:
{{champion:11}} 
q YEEEEEEEEEEEEEEET
w (low humming)
e YEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEET
r YEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEET
Master yeet.

Q: *Ooomph* "low chuckle" *Dink - Dink -Thunk*
W: *Shwooop Clink clink clink... TCHANK*
E: "Yarp!" *Thkk*
R: "YEEARGHH!" *THUNK* "Low chuckle" *eerie swoooooshing*
That Q is so accurate I almost heard it through your beautiful onomatopoeia.

I think Q is more like

Tink, Tink, FUCK YOU JUST DIE ALREADY, HOW THE FUCK DID YOU JUST GET HIT 3 TIMES ANYWAYS.

better one, enemies reactions.

Q: FUCK that missed me, stupid champ
W: god DAMNIT so lucky, fucking shield
E: how did he SLOW ME so broken
R: *breaks keyboard* NO COUNTERPLAY

{{champion:64}}

Q; I hate you so much *Death*
W: Why is this Legal?
E: Why  can this hit me from so far away?
R: Why does that trigger me so much?

Any Guesses?
(dont look at my match history thats cheating)
